entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
